entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 9 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
